Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and E.raw_text: Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, M.G.L. c. 209C.
Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and E.proposition: This Court has jurisdiction over this matter pursuant to the Probate and Family Court’s authority to modify custody and visitation orders affecting minor children who reside in Massachusetts and under the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, M.G.L. c. 209C.

M.G.L. c. 209A (Abuse Prevention Act);.proposition: The statutory and decisional authorities applicable to custody modification, child protection and abuse-prevention in Massachusetts include, without limitation:
